unnormalised: Arre yaar, the Virar local is always late! The schedule says it leaves at 6:15 AM sharp, but it usually shows up by 6:30 AM or even 6:45 AM. And don't even get me started on the traffic from Thane to Dadar during peak hours, easily takes 2 hrs! Flight to Bangalore is on 22/12, departing 8 PM, hopefully, no delays this time.
normalised: Arre yaar, the Virar local is always late! The schedule says it leaves at six fifteen A M sharp, but it usually shows up by six thirty A M or even six forty five A M. And don't even get me started on the traffic from Thane to Dadar during peak hours, easily takes two hours! Flight to Bangalore is on twenty second December, departing eight P M, hopefully, no delays this time.
